name: The Prophecy - A Minecraft Quest
description:
The world is in danger. An obscure prophecy is about to come true, and you are the last hope. The salvation lies inside a sacred but mysterious temple. Many went in but no one came out. Do you have what it takes to stop "The Prophecy"?

W,A,S,D to walk

Spacebar to jump

Shift to run

Mouse to aim

Mouse button to fire
